title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Strengthening Digital Pedagogical Competencies in Clothing Engineering

context.prior_knowledge: Basic apparel engineering knowledge and experience with essential digital tools
context.additional_context: A smartphone-based learning-optimized environment applying the TPACK (Technological, Pedagogical, and Content Knowledge) framework.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three digital transformation strategies for apparel engineering education content
Learners can design at least one educational module applying mobile-based microlearning design principles
Learners can identify at least two technical and pedagogical barriers that arise when applying digital teaching methods and propose solutions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
